thread.section_title: Outdoorsy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Outdoorsy | www.outdoorsy.co | 2 of 6
thread.title: Francis Juarez

author: Francis Juarez
title: Francis Juarez
text:
I'm new to the world of renting RVs, tried Outdoorsy for the first time, and I was impressed of the easy way the website has to navigate, and the customer service... I just asked a something on the chat and closed the window, and I got the answer on my email, JB was the person that followed up with me. Im positively surprised and thankful...
Good job guys!
